description: This Dart file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter application. It sets up the main layout of the home page, including a custom app bar, welcome texts, quick actions, and an informative card, using various custom and Flutter widgets.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing the main home screen with a custom background, app bar, welcome texts, quick actions, and an informational card.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including layout, texts, and custom widgets.
